item.title: Musk doubles down on threat to federal workers: File list of accomplishments or get fired
item.description: Elon Musk has been tasked by President Donald Trump with slashing federal government spending and the federal employee headcount, an effort known as D...

item.title: Trump says tariffs on Canada and Mexico 'will go forward'
item.description: President Donald Trump said sweeping tariffs on Canada and Mexico "will go forward" when a monthlong delay on their implementation expires next week.

item.title: U.S. judge allows Trump's AP Oval Office ban to stand over use of Gulf of Mexico name

item.title: Watch: Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron hold press conference
item.description: Trump and Macron convened in the Oval Office earlier to participate in a conference call with other leaders of the Group of Seven nations.

item.title: Ex-Secret Service agent and conservative media personality Dan Bongino picked as FBI deputy director
